PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07462019-06-09HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Serious Adverse Drug Reaction Reporting – Hospitals)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (SERIOUS ADVERSE DRUG REACTION REPORTING – HOSPITALS) in order to improve the quality and increase the quantity of Serious Adverse Drugs Reactions and Medical Device Incident reports, and to expand on the real world evidence used by Health Canada to monitor the safety and effectiveness of therapeutic product, as part of a life-cycle approach to the regulation of such products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0190 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
